#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType Tees.

== Name ==

[CTees Tees]

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--Tees (restriction)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
				Set of tees from which a golf course can be played.
		
----
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
----
    
===  Model ===

	<...  `colour`=xs:string  `date-from`=xs:date  `date-to`=xs:date  `gender`=[SGolfingGender GolfingGender]  
            *`name`=xs:string*
            `units`=[SUnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum UnitOfLengthWithUnitsEnum]>
            ( [CHoleQualification qualification], [CTee tee]{1,18}, [CVersion version]`*`   )
  </...>

----
